This thing doesn't work, but at least the inside seems isolative and might use it as a lunch box, but really disappointed and bought an overly expensive lunch box
The description of this item was misleading. It's much smaller then expected. And it doesn't plug into a wall
What it takes a microwave oven to warm in five minutes, this item takes 1-2 hours.
This product stopped working after a week of use. It won’t heat up as hot as it did first couple times.

reviewTitle: Only used a handful of times.
reviewDescription: This only worked  a short time. Maybe 15 at most. Then it just quit heating.
I would have liked to test this heated lunchbox put, but how can I if I can't even unzip the lunchbox? Pretty big letdown considering all the positive reviews.

Second purchase the first one we used for about a year and stopped so we said okay let’s just try again and this time after just a handful of times it just stopped . So we won’t be buying nor recommending

First look, cheap material which make the bag can't stand as it shape after removed the cardboard and manual inside. The heat board can only heat up the bottom of food container while the food inside is still cold. Plugin for 45mins, and yes the outside food container is hot, bottom is especially hot but everything inside is cold. There is no temp sensor or timer which may cause over burn or fire (saw another preview from other customer has pic of the bag was melted down because of the heat. Have no idea why it has many 5 stars reviews, better keep it true.

reviewTitle: Stopped working after a couple months
reviewDescription: I don’t know if I got a faulty portable lunch box but it started out at a good temp, I noticed the last few weeks my food has been scorching hot and then it just all of a sudden died and doesn’t work at all in any of the charging ports. I work in home health care and travel to homes all day and barely get a lunch as is and now I’m just eating cold lunches on the go until I can order another one. Really disappointed in this product.

reviewTitle: The case is thin fabric, delicate on the back.
reviewDescription: I bought this back in 2016 to heat up food in my work van off the inverter. I really like the unit and it heats up really well. The pros are endless but I have one con and it is the reason I didn’t give it all five stars. As you can see from the pictures, the back seam where the cord gets ticked always has torn open. I am not sure I can exchange it at this point, but you would think something for the working guy who uses it daily, would be crafted out of denier/ballistic nylon and not this lighter fabric, and certainly not polyester.I am going to end up having to figure something out now.

reviewTitle: Pretty cool! Worth the money? Maybe!
reviewDescription: I have an office job where I like to try and save money/poundage by not going out to eat more than once a week/every two weeks. I got one of these cause I take a lot of time to meal prep and make sure I eat good for the week, but I am disappointed by what the microwave does to my food. Dulls it, dries it, and doesnt heat it evenly. The hot logic has heated a weeks worth of my meal prep to perfection! My food is never dried out, always full of flavor and tastes like its freshly made. For this reason I find the hot logic to definitely be worth it, it was a little more expensive than i wouldve liked but hey, again, i think its worth it to have my food so nicely heated through every time :) Thanks for an awesome product!

we absolutely love this lunchbox but after 2 months the zipper completely broke off leaving hubbys lunch inside unable to open until he returned home and was able to wiggle it open to remove the food, of course now it's useless as it doesnt open and close, i noticed the price jumped increasing by 10.00 i hope they at least reinforced the zipper when they do so, otherwise i would certainly say I wouldnt purchase at this new price the old (2 month old) price was iffy for me.I am hoping they honor the replacement quickly without hassle, but for the most part I would say it was a purchase we were happy with but it obviously does need some redesigning for constant, daily use.

reviewTitle: Great little item, especially for work.
reviewDescription: Rather than heating items up from the cold state, I like to microwave my lunch before leaving the house, put it into the Hot Logic and plug it in after I get to work.  That way, it's already hot and I can eat as early as I like and the Hot Logic keeps it hot.  I like that the heating plate is removable so that you can rinse it out if you spill something which does happen occasionally when containers are not sealed properly.  A couple of things I wish they had done when designing would be to make it a bit larger and to have a zippered pocket on the outside for adding condiments, spoon, fork, etc. but depending on the size of your dish, you can probably just put them inside with your dish.  Since the item is insulated, it would probably work to remove the hot plate and keep cold foods chilled as well.
Thank you for enhancing my lunch. This is absolutely fantastic.
I've been using it for many times and I like this product because it is light weight and easy to carry. The only thing that I don't like is it takes more than an hour to make soup.

This was recommended by a friend and is exactly what I was looking for.  My husband drives for a living and doesn't get a lunch break, so he can plug this in and eat a hot meal during his 10 minute break.

Works great and makes the food very warm.  I didn't like having to keep washing out food containers so I bought some disposable foil trays that fit inside perfectly.  I had another brand that just stopped working for a month, but this one continues to work well.  The only think I wish was if it had an on/off switch as opposed to having to plug and unplug it as needed.  I keep it at work on my desk and bring my lunch. I bough a separate plug switch so I don't have to keep unplugging it.
I’m only giving 4 stars because my husband just started using it so far it’s working great and it heats the food up really fast so that’s a plus.

I’m wasn’t  sure if this hot logic was even  supposed to include a container, but it came totally broken and unusable. Not a big deal because it’s just cheap plastic… but still. Hopefully the actual Hot Logic works! Haven’t had a chance to try it yet.

reviewTitle: Does not come with wall outlet plug like in the picture.
reviewDescription: Had to rip the zipper open to even get inside to see if it had a wall plug to use. It did not. Only a cigarette lighter. Have to return for another brand.

I originally gave this 5 stars. However. This is my THIRD hot logic that has broken. The plug overheats and melts away nearly causing a fire within the vehicle. It’s not the vehicle because i use it in vastly different types of vehicles and it keeps happening. It also always happens less than a month after the return window happens to close. I don’t know what’s going on but I’m extremely disappointed in this product.

I bought this to warm up food in my car. It was not even ALITTLE warm and i had it plugged in for 30 mins. That means it would have to be on for 2 hours to warm up even alittle if that was the case. I bought it used like new so maybe a new one would have worked better.

I was excited to get this and when I did, I was completely disappointed.What a mission to actually get the zipper to open. The zipper is garbage.Inside came a cheap plastic all cracked.I still haven’t used it but this far, not looking forward to it anymore.
Al principio funcionó Perfecto después de 4 meses no funcionó para nada no lo recomiendo

I bought two of these because im a truck driver and both times the plug broke… its not intended for long term. Unless u want to buy one every six months stay away. I tried calling but it just goes to hotlogic voicemain. Will try a different company now
No calienta lo suficiente. Es la segunda vez que compro una lonchera de diferentes marca y las dos salieron igual, me pregunto quien será el responsable?

Absolute garbage Straight Out of the Box. Plugged it in didn't work. It is made so cheap the cord which plugs into the socket doesn't even have an indicator light to let you know that it is receiving electricity from the socket. Quality in our country today is a thing of the past people nowadays build things just to get your money rip you off give you the cheapest possible product with absolutely zero shame. It's all about getting your money. Not worth the box it was packaged in, do not waste your money.
So disappointed, eagerly waited to get this. It arrived today with no cord included. Had hoped to use it on a road trip but am out of luck as have to wait for replacement.

Purchased August 11th. Used it maybe a dozen times. Stopped working today September 20th. I bought this to heat food while I'm in my crane at work. Thats where it's been safely stored. Tried to use it today and it doesn't do anything. Checked fuses and they're all good. Expensive trash!

I rarely write a review and return items to stores. However, this item arrived in a manufacturer smashed up box. The container in it was damaged, and the zipper got stuck in two places. Very disappointing. I would buy something nicer or spend less money on a similar cheaper item like my sister purchased.
Stopped heating within 6 months of very casual use. Would be great if it was more durable and lasted..

reviewTitle: Product works great, other than it breaking after 3 months
reviewDescription: Love this product and it works great but unfortunately it broke after about 3 months of having it. I want to buy a new one but i'm not sure if it's worth spending the money if it is just going to break again in 3 months

Worked pretty good for awhile....bought in Feb. 2019 and was amazing. By April it started melting plastic containers which it is not supposed to do and by May it completely quit working.....I think it should last longer then 3 months. Especially since it wasn’t used every day. My husband only works 14 days of the month.
Doesn’t warm food up all the way unless u sit there for an hour with the car running. Gets the bottom of the food basically
Item returned.

I ordered the lunch blue item.came sat.looks small.i read the dimensions on the mini an lunch version. Why is the mini larger than what I ordered and the 1 I received  says mini on it.i ordered the lunch version  which I thought would be bigger.

This would have at least gotten a 4 star overall, but the charger for my car broke after having it for just 5 months and wouldn't allow me to warm my food. I'm hoping to get it replaced under warranty, but this was very disappointing

Makes the food too hot or dry! Does not keep it at a warm temperature as advertised.... oh! And it also takes too long to warm up so you tend to leave it plug for a bit THEN it makes the food burnt on one side or too dry.

I really enjoyed this as I drive in my truck all day, and this lets me eat healthier instead of buying fast food all the time.  However,  As of yesterday, it stopped heating!!  I won't purchase another one since they don't even last for 1 year.  Looks like I'll be looking into a different product now.
It does not warm your food even I plug it in for an hour.

reviewTitle: Didn't last ... See Edit: great customer service.
reviewDescription: Was good as long as it lasted. Coating on the hot plate started blistering and flaking little by little, even though I was very very careful on how i cleaned it.Contacting customer service to see how they will deal with it. Will update review after I get their feedback.UPDATE: contacted customer service and they were amazing. They sent me a replacement pad telling me it wasn't supposed to have done that. Those guys stand by their product. I will buy again from them.
The plug melted one day it was plugged in to the 12v plug. It does heat up food good. No temp control

reviewTitle: Background color of paisley design is bright pink! HATE IT!!!
reviewDescription: I love love love my hot logic!!! I have been using my all black one for over 2 years. Need to replace it because one of my animals tried to chew into it and broke the zipper. I WAS SO excited they had the paisley one!!!...BUT BUYER BEWARE!!! UNLESS you LOVE pink...you may not like this design. The background of the paisley design LOOKS black in the Amazon picture but it’s BRIGHT BRIGHT pink!!! So  annoyed.

Worked great for about a month. I went into my truck to get something  and I smelled something burning like your  know that distinctive wire smell investigated and discovered that the part that plugs into the outlet melted and was burning. Thank God I was close to the vehicle could’ve been really bad!

I have only had this for just over 2 months and the plug messed up. The center piece doesn't stay out so it will not maintain contact with the plug. Tried taking it apart see if it can be repaired, but I was afraid I was going to break the plastic.

reviewTitle: It take a while to actually heT up the food and a part of the zip us faulty.I am not impressed.
reviewDescription: The long wait time for the food to heat up and the faulty zipper

Broke after the first month. Worked well when it did work though. Warmed food up in about an hour. The adapter that plugs into the car port basically came apart inside the port and I can't get it out.
Have yet to use it but it arrived with a broken lid.

reviewTitle: 12v adapter quit working within a month
reviewDescription: Adapter quit working within a month. Can’t figure out how to contact the seller

reviewTitle: Not for everybody, unless you're willing to wait to eat.
reviewDescription: I was so excited to receive mine. I put it thru the test right away, within 20 minutes of opening the package it came in. Left over spaghetti was on the menu. This was going to be a great thing because I'd just got home from work and was hungry.According to the manual most leftover are ready in 30-40 minutes. Okay I figured, not as quick as a microwave, but it promises a better quality meal, so............I put the refrigerated spaghetti in the provided prep container, closed the top and placed it in the cooker, and zipped it shut. I plugged it in at 5:22 pm. I eagerly awaited the results. I did get hung up on doing something else so I didn't get to open it at the 40 minute mark. It wasn't until 6:11 pm I got to open it. It really hadn't done anything at all. You could feel warmth on the bottom of the container, but most of it was still cold after 50 minutes.So, does it work? I'm not so sure about that. I stopped my test and got something else to eat. It may have eventually worked. But come on...... it may have taken another 30 minutes at least. And that was refrigerated, not frozen! Can't imagine how long frozen would have taken.I'm probably going to take them up on the full refund.

The zipper constantly gets stuck when opening and closing, also the hot pan does not have an off and on switch. So you must unplug every time it’s not in use or whenever you wish it to stop heating up the tray.
The product worked fine at first, but after 2 months its broken. So now i have to find something else. Btw, I drive trucks. I use it everyday!
I had this for less than 2 months. Used it maybe 20 times. And now it does heat up.
No sirve , y muy pequeña esta mas largo sobre tamaño carta

reviewTitle: These are useful, but they keep dying.
reviewDescription: Useful for reheating leftovers or heating food when traveling. However, they don't last.Since they are cheap and useful, I'm on my third one now. Would be nice if they lasted though.
Good concept but the zipper broke and gets stuck on corners. Past return window.
Husband loved the product until the plug melted

(UPDATE)So I've been using this about 8 months steady, and it's worked pretty well. I had to re solder a new plug end on it about 4 months in, because the old one just fell apart because it's so low quality. It just stopped working this week on me and I pulled it apart to see if a connection had broken off inside the plate. One indeed did, the coil wire completely dissolved and left both ends burnt and frayed. For what you pay for, the least they could do is use a little heavier wire and better quality parts. I'm going to try a Chinese brand one now because that's just what this seems to be.This is one of the best purchases I have made in a while. I meal prep for the work week and have gotten sick of eating cold lunches. I work construction and am usually away from a microwave. It takes about an hour to fully warm up a meal kept in the refrigerator. It will not over cook the food like a microwave will, so the food is reheated is the tastiest way.

reviewTitle: Doesn’t fit in my charger port
reviewDescription: My friend purchased this and told me it’s a great product. However, mine arrived with a cracked plastic top inside. The plastic wasn’t a big deal, I have plenty of those containers. I’m just disappointed that the charger port doesn’t fit my car. I drive a 2019 ford escape. Pretty standard yet the charger port doesn’t fit.

This item was obviously used and abused before. IReceived it and upon opening it, I noticed how dirty it was on the inside. There was dried up food all around the inside. I plugged it in and the plate warmer doesn’t even heat up. How was this mistaken by a new item?

It takes an hour for my food to get warm and it’s not even cold food. Problem is, I have to run my car engine running while using this so it waste gas everytime I use it as I have to warm 2 meals as I work long 12 hours shift. It’ doesn’t even make the food hot after one full hour and it’s just warm.

reviewTitle: Zipper got stuck with my food inside!
reviewDescription: Zipped open and was ready to use , when trying to get food out zipper was complete stuck. I wanted this product to be great as my lunch I had to throw away

Bought this for my husband so he could eat hot food on the road. He’s a service man so being able to eat something hot instead of a cold sandwich makes a world a difference. It was GREAT while it worked HOWEVER it BROKE AFTER 6 months. Purchased in January and just broke at end of July. The connector part doesn’t work. He had to use tape or something to rig it together.Usage: Did NOT use everyday, only sent home with hot food like once a week. Just for usage reference.Was able to find a # for company and waiting for call back. Hoping they’ll replace it. I’ll update this review once that happens.

This product is exactly what I wanted, however the zipper on the item I received was defective. I have since requested a replacement. If it was not for the zipper issue, this would have been a 5 star!!!!! review****UPDATE***I received a replacement, however it has the same issue. The product zipper is defective. This would have been such a great product if the manufacturer had went with a better quality zipper.

Unfortunately it doesnt get as hot as most reviews claim. Im not sure if i got a defective one, definitely feels like i did, but it doesn’t produce heat. I bought it for myself to have lunch in my van everyday, and i only used it twice because it never worked. Im starting to meal prep again and i pulled it out of the cabinets to retry and it just doesnt transfer heat to the food very well. Ive gone as far as leaving it cooking in my van for 3hours and the food is luke warm at best. Wouldnt recommend. Im going to loom into a different one
I absolutely loved this till it stopped working after about 4 months. It’s winter again and I’m back on the market for a new one
Doesn’t get hot enough even when turned on for hours.

It worked great for about 5 months and just stopped heating. The light comes on and the heat plate gets luke warm but 4 hours after putting my lunch on it the food is still cold. For the price paid I would assume it would last longer. I used it about 3 days a week driving truck locally.

reviewTitle: Does not, I repeat, does not heat food!
reviewDescription: Ok, I SO wanted this to work because I'm convinced that zapping food in a microwave is killing us all. This product is a great idea in theory but simply just not good. It NEVER  heats up food thoroughly enough. I have no idea what some speak of when they say it has gotten their food hot. I purchased for use at work and used small portions of vegetables/chicken to heat. After more than 2 hours, food was not hot. The plate was hot, but not food. Even a small cup of soup never got warm enough to eat, even after stirring it a few times while it was "warming." I will try to say something good: nice inconspicuous bag, zips up nicely with food inside, doesn't give off weird smell so no one will know you are using it at work, sellers are AMAZING and very gracious to work with. They gave me a full refund as a courtesy because I had longer than thirty days.

I received a “Mini” but I did not order a mini! I would not have paid $40 for something so small! This was a Christmas gift & it’s not what she wanted! This is for a small lunch, not a casserole sized dish! My hand is for size reference.
This product was good while it lasted. the heater inside burned out on me after a year to where it no longer works so not much durability luck on my end.

reviewTitle: It takes too long to heat up food.
reviewDescription: I love how compact it is and easy to pack but it takes too long for food to warm up. One hour is barely enough with most foods and I’m vegetarian. I can’t imagine how much longer it would take to heat up meat.

Use this at work all the time with leftovers and lean cuisines at my desk or on the road in the car. It really works and keeps food at a steady 165 degrees after just two hours. It’s way overpriced. If you find one on a deal or with the Pyrex included, maybe it’s almost reasonable. Otherwise I can’t believe it costs $40.
Didn’t realize it didn’t have a regular plug for indoor outlets.  Would be great for over the road travel in a car, but not for a flight attendant on a layover at a hotel
I loved this thing at first! I had hot lunches everyday and it worked great. After about 6 weeks of use it just stopped working. It won't heat up at all. I am very disappointed I loved this thing.
It was great until it stopped heating after about 3 weeks of use. Couldn't figure out how to get it working or have any company contact info. Bummer because it was really nice while it lasted
Didn't last a year with moderate use. Have used cheaper ones and have gotten a few years thought I was upgrading.  So disappointed.
East to use however when it’s getting warm the unit it’s self stinks like melting plastic and it makes the food taste like it smells as well

reviewTitle: It’s OK, only makes food “warm not hot” after about 3 - 4 hours
reviewDescription: Easy to bring with you on the road but takes about 3 to 4 hours to actually make leftover food that was cold, hot. After three hours it’s pretty much lukewarm, every time.
Best purchase Ive ever made while living on the go.
This is the best food warmup ever.

I've had this warmer for maybe about a few weeks. This things heats up everything amazing.  For me it takes about an hour to heat my soup or meal prep in a maybe a 16 oz glass container?? I have not had ONE issue and I use it 5 days a week. The only small thing is that you have to plug it in or unplug it to turn it on and off. There is no type of indicator informing you how hot your food is...at the end of the day it's just meant to sit at my desk at work and use it so I don't need to wait in line to warm up my food in the only available microwave. 5 stars!

Got this for my boyfriend. He’s a cop and spends all day on shift in his vehicle and wanted to have a way to warm his food on the go. He personally rated this item 100/10 so kudos to HotLogic. He approves, therefore I approve ❤️
I’m very familiar with this product, which is why I ordered a second one. It’s a great travel essential

I use this to reheat my food while I drive for work. I’ve used it to reheat brats wrapped in tinfoil just placed inside on the hot plate to full food containers of taco meat, spaghetti and so much more. I give it about an hour and stir occasionally to make sure my food is Hot and it is!!! Highly recommend!!!!

I have owned a Hot Logic Mini for six or seven years.  Initially, I purchased it for camping and potluck dishes where I might need to provide my own heat to keep the dish warm.In the last couple of years, I have come to rely on this as my lunch box when I work.  I absolutely love that I can meal prep lunches ahead of time and have anything from fish to soup in this little gem.  I can plug it in somewhere in a quiet corner out of the way when I arrive at work and then 2-3 hours later when it's my lunch break, I have a hot lunch waiting for me without needing to find a microwave oven or stove.  Absolutely no cooking food aromas can be smelled until I uncover my casserole dish when it's time to eat.Often my coworkers stop by to check and see what's on the lunch menu for the day.  I am frequently told I have the most appetizing lunches around.  One of my favorites is cheese ravioli with sauce.  I start with frozen, uncooked ravioli then add a little sauce to the bottom of my dish (so that the pasta doesn't stick to the bottom of the dish), arrange my ravioli  on top of that, and top with more sauce and a handful of mozzarella cheese.  Delicious!I prefer using glass/pyrex-type baking dishes in the Hot Logic.  The Pyrex brand six-cup is a perfect fit as is the six-cup Snapware brand.  However I do prefer the Razab 6.5 cup with locking lids the best.  They are less expensive, completely leak-proof and also a perfect fit for the Hot Logic Mini.  (https://smile.amazon.com/dp/B081PBY1CR?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details)One can heat ready-to-eat frozen meals still sealed inside the cardboard container without risk of anything burning.  A person can use any flat-base dish for eating and cooking, including paper plates or bowls, aluminum foil, aluminum pans, plastic, glass, heavy-duty freezer bags, and even restaurant carry-out containers.  A person can also cook food from raw, as it functions much like a slow cooker.  It has more difficulty with root vegetables (potatoes, carrots, turnips), and it will not sear or crisp edges on meat.  It doesn't do well rice or pasta either, so when I do these, I pre-cook to al dente.  It is perfect for frozen portions though!It is a great meal preparation device for one or two people!

I got this for my elderly mother, who has always been a slow eater.  This keeps her food warm without ruining it, and she and her aide are very happy with it. Simple to operate, and simple to clean.  I also purchased the covered glass dish but you can use any container, which is a plus. Recommended!

This is my second purchase and I use it at work instead of using the microwave. It works great for frozen meals and left overs, also if you plan for it,  you can actually cook in it for lunch. (I've cooked pasta)My first one lasted almost 9 years, so I would say that I definitely got my monies worth.There is no temp control so you'll want to make sure to check on your food to turn,  stir or to determine that it's done to your liking.Yes, I recommend this product and will buy again should I need to.
I use this all the time at work. Does what it's supposed to do.

Speaking from experience, a typical hot plate is just too large and heavy to easily travel with. This is very compact and lightweight. You can make a cup of tea with it, but using average-cold tap water it's going to take between 30 to 45 minutes when heating one cup (I zipped the cover over the cup while heating). In continental Europe, don't expect coffee makers or tea kettles in your room. This mini hot plate eventually gets the job done. . A standard hot plate you really need to buy from the region you intend to use it in. For this min plate, the power usage is so low that I personally wouldn't worry about using it anywhere in America/Europe. I'm not sure yet whether I'd leave any heat source unattended in my car, but that's my tendency toward caution. If you're up for that, adapters are available. I wish I had something that heated things faster, but you can't beat the size/weight.
El tamaño es mas pequeño de lo que pense

This is going back. It's a great idea for lunch warming and such but while it claims to cook too and that there are only a few items it won't cook unless they're submerged in water (carrots, potates) it also was a great disappointment when I set my egg fritatta to be ready for breakfast 9 hours ahead of getting up. So much water still on top of these eggs, maybe because of the condensation from the sealed container (required). Just had to finish frying it up in the cast iron. The spices had not taken to add flavor either. I also made a balsamic/onion pork chop (from raw) and apples/carrots with ginger and cinnamon in there. The apples were mushy, the carrots underdone and the pork chewy. So, heat up your soup or stew in there, but nothing fancy going on here. Maybe great when I'm ninety and have a tiny kitchen and am not that hungry anyway. Don't underestimate your happiness for it though if you have a job for which this fits.
I use it to warm up my lunch in my service truck, but it won’t  last a year the way I use it, I’m a mechanic.

Purchased this as a gift for my hard working husband who works in the elements 6 days a week.  I pack his lunch daily and it normally consists of wraps, salads or the occasional chili/soup in his thermos.  I cook dinner every night and wished he worked closer to town to heat his food, but he’s normally in the country and miles away from a gas station or anywhere he can heat his food.  I saw this and was eager to order it.  The only downfall I see is that it didn’t come with a car adapter.  If these are advertised as portable; then be 100% portable.  It lost 2 stars because I assumed it was perfect only to find it lacked a major piece

I am in love with this.  I plugged my food up around 8 am and had my lunch at 1 and it was scorching hot.  I am sure I didnt have to heat it up that long but it was my first time using it .  My food still stayed juicy and not dried out.  I used a pyrex glass dish with a plastic lid.  Hopefully it will last years.Ok update somehow I either overlooked that it had a hole at the seam or using the zipper loosened the seam but either way I only used it 2x and had it less than a month so it should not be like this.  So I am sending it back today for a replacement because it really really works well.Updated pics had to knock stars off from this review.  Sorry but I refuse to pay so much for it to RIP on me

reviewTitle: Cute Box. Works good in a pinch.
reviewDescription: I've only used it once and it seemed to work ok. Doesn't make your food hot just keeps it warm. I did expect the box to be a little bigger than it actually is.

I like the idea of the hot logic, but often found that the 12volt plug wasnt convenient unless I remembered to use it while driving.  When I'm in my RV it would be nice to plug into a regular outlet with my inverter on.

I have bought for these now. My latest one was very disappointing the 1st time I used it the container melted. I was gonna be buying 4 more of them for Christmas gifts but I'm gonna check other brands now.

reviewTitle: Good product, but takes forever to heat up
reviewDescription: It’s nice and compact, and was made well. But it really just takes forever to heat up any food, whether it’s a small or big portion. I’m a flight attendant and bought this to use for the homemade meals I take with me on trips, but I find myself only using it as a last resort when I don’t have access to a microwave, just because it takes so incredibly long to heat up my food. It’s a good product to have as a last resort, but as a first choice, not my cup of tea.
Works just as described. Heats up fast & stays hot for a long time!
Great for the price!

reviewTitle: Best darn method to warm food...hands down!
reviewDescription: I love the way my food tastes after being slowly heated in this lunch box. It actually makes leftovers taste even better without the hazardous radiation microwaves give.

I fell in love with this warming pouch. I love it so much, I have purchased 4 of these, at various times, for gifts. Everyone I’ve given one of these, loves them, too.  It does exactly what is stated in the information provided. You plug it in, place food in it, zip the lid closed, and wait for your food to be heated. It does so quickly, and doesn’t dry it out. When I DON’T want food heated quickly, I just leave the cover unzipped and flipped back.  And, if you have an item that’s too large to fit inside the pouch, you can take the heating tray out of the pouch and simply place the item on the tray. (I actually pack it in my luggage and travel, with it. It really comes in handy, to re-heat leftovers from lunch/dinner, when you’re staying in a hotel.)

Works amazing my husband uses this for work to keep him food warm until it’s time for lunch and it doesn’t over cook nor does it burn your food keeps its at a steady 165 degrees and stays warm for up to 12 hours! Best Buy ever!!!!
I’m a flight attendant and have seen these around the system. After 2 decades I purchased this one. It’s compact, light, easy to use. Can heat 2 medium size plastic containers in 20min!
This thing is a life saver in my line of work warm meals is always a plus!

reviewTitle: Life just got a little nicer...
reviewDescription: As mentioned in other reviews, this food warmer is really just a hotplate in an insulated bag.At first glance the Hot Logic Mini doesn't seem to be very special. However, upon closer inspection (and use) it is apparent that Hot Logic has put a lot of thought into this product and the intended use and has produced a very well-made and useful product.Plus, after much research I can't find any other product out there that comes close to matching the features and versatility of this portable food warmer. Before I get into my (long winded) review here are some specs on this unit.Specs:o 1 shelf with Smart Shelf Technology (cycles off and on maintaining optimal food temp.)o Nylon case available in four colors: Black, Blue, Green, Orangeo Exterior dimension 10"W X 8"L X 3.5"Ho Can accommodate food containers up to 8.75"W x 6.75"L x 2.5"Ho Plugs into a 110v standard wall outleto Heats food to a max of 212 degreeso Consumes 42 Wattso Weighs 1 lb. 4 oz.o Electric Cord is 48" longo UL CSA Certifiedo 1 Year WarrantyI travel a lot for work, mostly by car, and after years of fast food (mostly unhealthy, expensive, time consuming, and often served from unsanitary establishments) I started looking for something to take with me on the road other than a cooler with a cold sandwich.After looking at all of the available items out there I fortunately settled on the Hot Logic Mini.After receiving the Hot Logic Mini the first thing I noticed was that it is a quality made product. The attractive double zippered nylon case opens and closes easily and the 48" electric cord is long enough for my needs. (Note: The cord can be folded and stored in the pocket in the back of the case.)Eager to try it out I simply dumped some chili in one of my many Pyrex glass containers (I prefer glass containers.), snapped on the container lid, zippered the Hot Logic Min shut, and plugged it in. 45 minutes later, I had piping hot chili. Of course your result will vary depending on starting food temperature, portion size, container size, etc.Note: You can use most any appropriately sized flat bottomed container (with tight cover) as the maximum heating/cooking temperature will not reach over 212 degrees. (The warming plate will cycle off and on maintain a maximum temperature of 212 degrees.)  At this temperature food will be kept well above the recommended 135 to 165 degrees for food safety, but not hot enough to burn your food or container.After use, you simply have to wash the container you used. (Much easier than some of the warming products where the container is built in or requires that you buy disposable liners.)I did read a few non-positives about this product such as it not having an on/off switch. However, I am ok with that as a switch would add bulk and is just one more thing that could break. However, if you are using this at an office and have to crawl underneath your desk to reach an outlet, you might think about getting an extension cord with a switch or at least one placed so you can easily plug and unplug this warmer.Also, this unit only runs on 110v AC (household current), however this is not a big dealer to me either as it is only pulling 42 Watts and even the cheapest DC to AC inverter should be able to handle that. Plus, many new cars come with an AC outlet built in.Bottom line I am very happy with this purchase. I can heat up (or cook)food as I drive down the road and pull over under a shady tree and have a nice hot lunch (and a nap afterwards). When I get to a hotel I can keep it in the room to heat up leftovers or food I buy from the market. I'll also use it at home to heat up (and possibly cook)food as it uses a lot less electricity than my oven or microwave. Plus, I don't have to plan my meal times perfectly as the Hot Logic Mini will keep my hot food at the right temperature for hours.I hope this review helps!
Muy buen equipo facilita el calentar la comida

This has made ALL THE DIFFERENCE! Be advised, not all recipes or left-overs will work so effortlessly well. I cannot report that I have found any of those. I suspect there are only a few things. But I have merely started to empower myself with such a risk-free hot meal at all times, that I can capture the moment to do so at work. Firstly, I have tried successfully to provide myself with ready hot meals with the Crock-Pot lunch warmer. It works well. However, being restricted to the proprietary container, leaves too much narrowness to the equation for any absolute satisfaction, because of singularly limited dining containers. Now, for the HotLogic warmer, I can have my own meal warmed and held in a container compatible to my choice (Glass-Lock) to deliver to me an instantly gratifying hot lunch in my work environment to satisfy any stickler for individualistic superiority. All the other lunch-minions scurry for some mucked-up public microwave to scald and scorch and boil their miserable leftovers or plastic, industrial, MSG ridden, convenience poison, waiting in line for the scarce minutes to sit down to their reluctant pseudo-nutrition. I merely remove my container from the HotLogic pack and open it on my elegant place mat and sink my personal tableware into some succulent entré, lifting it to my waiting pallet to indulge in the anticipated culinary delight (choose your own verbiage). With just the right added ingredients, I can make a plain-Jane substance turn into the reason to go to work. Maybe my imagination has gotten the best of me, but my imagination has been inspired by this HotLogic Personal Oven (lunch warmer) to ready myself for tomorrow. Like some obsessive competition, I look forward to making someone break the ice and ask me about this rig. I merely go about my business as if the mechanics of fixing a superior lunch for myself is far better than marching off to some Greasy-Spoon, Blue-Plate-Special. Well, it is!Okay. Now to review this product. I have become so personally enthusiastic about the success of my initial use of the HotLogic Personal Portable Oven that I can make this comment. The potential is clear to me and the failure is impossible. In just one week, five work days, I have become the greatest advocate in my living room. Not bad for an introvert! So, I tried to sabotage my experience. Can you imagine anything worse than to put cooked Japanese Black Rice in the refrigerated container. Three days later I open a can of salmon, pick the bones and soft skins, throw in some fresh asparagus cuts with a little butter, teriyaki glaze, dehydrated garlic and onion and closed it up, thinking I might have made a mistake. My hypothesis was pointed towards disaster, however, even though I still expected the worst, that the salmon would stink the break-room, that was my only mistake. Surprisingly, I sat down to a tasty dish, even for canned fish, and delighted in not having made a mistake at all. I have turned cheap cake with a dollop of cream cheese, frozen berries and white chocolate chips, into a tasty warm desert to round off my private dinner. There is no way I would wait to pay top-dollar for such excellent results. The thing is that I merely placed the ingredients in the container, sealed it up and packed it for the next day or two in the fridge. Then I plucked it to carry to work and placed it in the HotLogic first thing, forgetting it. Lunch could be at any time several or few hour later. When that time came, I merely unzipped the enclosure, as the containers were held at table-hot temperatures perfectly and suspended in time, and placed my succulent nourishment before my salivating anticipation. I even tried a portion of buttered bread folded in foil and received a tender accompaniment to my feast. This is better than a cold bento box. Why should I call in reservations at the Angus Barn? I just entertain the imagination a little, mainly because that imagination is inspired by the readiness of a perfect hot meal all because of this HotLogic. Don't take my word for it. Just DO IT! I am now a member of the clean lunch plate club.

I have been using Hot Logics for many years. I'm a truck driver and it's perfect for plugging in and leaving until you get a chance to eat. It takes an hour to heat up to 165 degrees then stays there. It will not scorch or burn food. I always use sealed glass bowls and it heats perfect, every single time. Get you one!

My husband bought this for me for work and I will say after plugging it in for an hour my food was very hot! Definitely would recommend if you need something to warm up your food on the go as long as you have a plug near

Purchased 12/3/22, I use it several times a week in the semi truck and it never fails. So far best $$ I’ve spent. I reheat, cook noodle bowls in it and it usually takes about an hour or less. The only improvement I would do is add about 2’ more to the cord.
Nice product. It’s nice to be able to have a hot meal while on the train for 12 or more hours.

reviewTitle: This Mini Portable Electric Lunch Box Food Heater really heats up your food!
reviewDescription: Working a 12hr Overnight shift Security mobile Patrol Heating pre-prep food or cooking makes Lunch so convenient and its  a must have while working in a Vehicle!

The hot logic is perfect to take frozen entrees right out of the carton and place onto the hot logic. In 2 1/2hrs it is ready. It is so convenient  to take to work to have a fresh hot meal, because  you can  leave it in there to keep warm until your ready to eat it! It is like a slow cooker but no mess or clean up!

I am super heated!!!! Maybe I should try to heat my food on my head because I sure can’t use this hotlogic unit. I must have totally over looked the fact that this could only be used in a vehicle. I bought this for my wife to use in her office and She Shed, but no way to plug into an outlet. I wasted my money. Don’t make the same mistake. I gave it 5 stars, because I had too, but never used it.

The first issue that I want to cover is something that made me drop my jaw when I read it more than once in the reviews: This Portable Oven IS NOT Intended To Cook Food!Geeez... guys... no! You first prepare a meal and cook it. Then, a portion of that "already cooked food" may go in an appropriate container. Later, you place that container inside the 'Hot Logic Mini Portable Oven,' set the timer to be on for 2 [two] hours, plug it in a live outlet, and walk away. When you come back, the oven has done a good job to bring food to the right temperature.This is my schedule:1.- In the evening, I prepare and cook a meal. After it cools off, I place it in a container and in the refrigerator. As a personal preference, I added two [2] tablespoonfuls of healthy Olive Oil and I sprinkle the entire meal with Herbs de Provence from France. Both ingredients are available at Amazon.2.- After I have breakfast the following morning, I place the container inside the 'Hot Logic Mini Portable Oven,' set a timer to turn on two [2] hours before I get back home, and I walk out the door. When I come back home from work, I go straight to another healthy meal which is at the right temperature.Assuming normal ambient temperature, I estimate that 12 to 14 ounces of food reach a sensible temperature to eat in two [2] hours. Longer than two [2] hours may expose nutrients to heat for too long.This 'Hot Logic Mini Portable Oven' has been a hero to me. I stopped relying on unhealthy ~and costly~ breakfasts at fast-food restaurants, I get much more satisfied with food Mother Nature provides which keeps me healthy.I already concluded that this 'Hot Logic Mini Portable Oven' is the closest a single guy can get to a wife. Well... but not in all departments, of course.

I was introduced to this product by a friend and I absolutely love it. Simply place your lunch bowl in the warmer, plug it in, and voila! You'll enjoy a deliciously heated meal that is not overcooked or burnt.  This warmer is easy to clean and conveniently fits on my desk without any hassle.
Que mi comida esta caliente en un par de horas trabajo conduciendo es muy práctico
Warmes up left overs while traveling in your vehicle all day. Don't have to just pack boring sandwiches or buying lunches with inflation prices. Best Christmas gift ever my husband says.
Dislike.... The time it takes to warm up food, too long.Like... On long drives, or out of town travels, it's a must have, take along.Good for Truck Drivers!

My employer's kitchen has been closed since Covid.  I cook on a regular basis and was definitely tired of bringing salads and sandwiches to work for lunch.  Therefore, my search began for a heated lunch box.  This product was one of many that I saw during my search.  I was a little skeptical about all of the products.  I decided on this one and was glad that I purchased it.  Needless to say, I am now eating hot lunches again.  This product definitely heats up well in a short period of time.  Food heats in a very short period of time (about 30 minutes or less).  Great product.The product has a 1 year warranty.  However, if you register the product, you can receive a 2 year extended warranty for free.

My husband is a delivery driver for a local beverage company, being in his truck all day he doesn't have access to a place to warm up his food so he was taking sandwiches and cold lunches everyday. Living in the midwest, being a driver in winter and having a cold lunch is just a bad combo. I purchased this for him and he loves it! It heats the food perfectly, it's the perfect size for our leftover containers. The only reason I docked it one star is because it doesn't come with an adapter for using in a vehicle. Luckily we already had one. Otherwise great product!

Patience is required. This will not heat things up as fast as people say unless they are small portions. A container of leftovers out of the fridge takes a little under an hour. A container of leftovers out of the freezer takes close to two hours. A frozen pasta dish in heavy sauce will take close to three hours. And you have to watch this. It will overcook and ruin your food.That all being said, if you can plan your reheating time accordingly, reheated dishes out of this taste worlds better than microwaved leftovers. As do meal delivery dishes. Most meal prep containers fit perfectly in this. I ended up buying a second one so I have one at home and one at work. I have had them both close to two years and they both still work just fine.

The ONLY negative is that the zipper is a little tough to get it to make its way around the corners.This thing is great. I'm a mobile field tech repairing heavy equipment. I LOVE this thing. It's way better than a microwave. The food is not rubbery or tough after reheated in Hotlogic. I turned around and bought the 11v AC version.  I love it also.

As a flight attendant, i'm constantly on the go and in different cities every day. With the ongoing Covid-19 Pandemic relying on hotel and local restaurants became very unpredictable. So I began to pack my own food to bring with me on trips. I had heard great things about Hot Logic and was very excited to get one. The Hot Logic itself works great. They even included a meal container to go with it. However, after only 4 months the plastic top to the container cracked from the heat and the zipper broke in half when I went to zip it closed. Make me wonder if the metal in the zipper was fatigued. Hopefully if you purchase this product you'll have better luck with the zipper. It's the only reason I cannot give it a 5 star rating. Needless to say i'm disappointed, but i'll make do.
Great idea. Perfect for working on the road.But I happily would’ve paid a couple extra bucks for a good zipper that doesn’t get stuck on the corners

reviewTitle: This product has worked well! 5 months so far
reviewDescription: I bought the hot logic mini 5 months ago, for my husband, he really likes this product.ProsIt really keep stuff nice and hot!Easy to clean, easy to use.ConsTakes about 30 mins to heat up foodUse glass container because it has no heat control.
Heats up food perfectly a little smaller than I thought

reviewTitle: More of a food warmer to me
reviewDescription: I use this on my desk at work to avoid the communal kitchen.  I have never tried this with frozen food.  I have never tried this with raw food.  But in my experience, I would keep this as a food warmer.  If you have more than what's in this, you will need TWO lunch bags?  Or one really big one that hold this plus your other food.  I'm going to experiment with just leaving this at work and carrying my lunch back and forth.

reviewTitle: Just over a year and it stop working
reviewDescription: This was perfect for left-overs for lunch the next day as a driver. I got a little over a years use out of it.Plugged it in as usually,30 minutes later a cold lunch.dont know what broke on it,my guess is the heating element. would like to buy another but i will prolly try a different brand.

This thing works exactly as advertised.  I had my doubts and I was wrong,The zipper is a bit difficult to operate and fragile which is why I maked it down a star.  I will ether break in and run smoother or it will fail.This is a perfect job site lunch tool!
Smaller than I thought it would be. It does get warm enough to warm up your food though.

This is awesome for a truck driver, if your a truck driver, I suggest you get this, it’s perfect, I put any meal preps my wife makes me in it and keeps it warm all day, works great with Campbell’s soup in a Tupperware and ravioli. You can also put those cups of stew they sell at truck stop in it and it will heat it up and keep it warm, I like using this better than my microwave. Doesn’t take up much space too.

I travel all the time and decided to get this so I could have a hot meal in the hotel room without having to order expensive room service. I've only used it once and it worked great! My only complaint is the zipper seems flimsy like it's going to rip or something. The zipper is poor quality and it's hard to zip in a couple of places (this is while it's empty and I only put a small dish in there so it was never overstuffed) and I'm afraid it will tear or break soon. I will have to be extra gentle and hope it doesn't tear because I love having a hot meal on my overnights now! My food was heated evenly, was piping hot and not burned. That's a win for me!
I like that it is portable, and it comes with a food container. what I dislike is that it takes about 1 hour to heat up food that fills the container.

I love this lunch box with heating  element.  when I get to work I plug it in and I have nice hot lunch when I'm ready and I don't have to use the gross communal microwave.  I only wish the paisley pattern was in a taller version.

I love this bag and the only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 is because it would be nice if this had a light on it to signal that it was actually on because I'm construction the outlets may not be live and then you get cold food

Second warming tote I buy from Hot Logic.The tip where you connect to the car always gets damaged. It sinks in and can't be fixed. Also the fuse went out on one of them. I handle it very carefully when inserting and ejecting. Yet it still gets ruined. Wasted over $80 within a few months. Save your money and go for an outlet warming tote. Use a power inverter to connect to car.
I purchased this product almost two months ago and it no longer works. The heating function has stopped working. Would not recommend
does not work in regular car 12v outlet must have 150v converter the description is not true
Only lasted 3 months got another one from the warranty and lasted another 5 months. Not worth it at this point

reviewTitle: Not worth it! Quit for no reason, still looks brand new
reviewDescription: My husband is a truck driver who packs lunch daily to heat up for lunch. We ordered this and received it on August 14, 2020. He used it almost daily, and on October 16, 2020 it did not heat his lunch. When I looked, it was too late to return. I’ve since purchased another Road Pro heater, which he will begin using tomorrow. We previously had one, and it lasted over a year.

reviewTitle: IT'S A WALL PLUG!!! NOT FOR CARS!!!
reviewDescription: MMAKE SURE YOU K IW THAT THIS IS NOT FOR YOUR CAR! Its a WALL PLUG...i wish i would have went to use this vefore the return window was done.  Unfortunately i sat it to the side for a month  , then prepared a nice "warm" lunch for my husband to warm' IN HIS CAR'  then looked at it to gind uts a darn wall plug and it was to late to exchange/return..will have to buy a $20 converter
I bought one and the zipper is terrible! I have to rip it to get it open! I'll never buy one again.

reviewTitle: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT UNLESS YOU WANT TO RISK ...
reviewDescription: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT UNLESS YOU WANT TO RISK FOOD POISONING!!  Sadly, I missed my 30 day window to send this back or I would have. I don't know whether it is broken or just being misrepresented on the website. I just got around to trying it out and it does NOT get anywhere near the proper temperature to hold food. After leaving my pre-cooked hot dog in it inside a glass flat-bottom dish for 3 hours (double the maximum length of time it said it would take to heat), the internal temperature only made it to 111 degrees....prime target for food poisoning. Wish I could send this expensive product back.
I purchased this and when I tried to use it… never got my food warm it was not working…. Of course I didn’t save packaging and was unable to return it.
Used a few times a week. Doesn’t work anymore. Lifespan of ~6 months? Not good.
I like how convenient it is but it cuts off periodically while in use as if it has a shortage. Exchanged the first one for a new one and it also cuts off during use. Not satisfied.

reviewTitle: Received a clearly used, foul smelling product
reviewDescription: I just received my product and noticed the box was not sealed.  I opened it up to find a clearly used product which included a HotLogic heating dish.  I made the mistake of lifting off the lid and was punched in the face by the smell of old food.You cannot sell a used product as new, there is a whole section of Amazon for that.  And if you are going to, at least replace the plastic heating dish and reseal the box!!  Working on a refund as we speak.
I really loved this product it kept things hot such a great idea.  I've had it for 2 months but all of a sudden it has stopped working. I'm bummed  out

Purchased new back in November of 2022, only used for work. Went to use it today, March 6 2023 and stopped working, has power to plug (light is on) no heat. Very disappointed, I guess made in the USA isn't a good choice after all.
Didn’t work and wrong plug I want a refund

reviewTitle: So disappointed in this recent purchase & brand.
reviewDescription: I absolutely love my first purchase hence a return customer.  I use everyday!  Product quality has fallen substantially.  Warning ... not made like once were!

As soon as it arrived, I tried it out. It makes a bad burning plastic smell from the hot plate. I took a watt reading and it's at 43 watts which is within range. It works, but literally stinks, bad. Anyone else have this problem?
If was wonderful, until it decided not to work.

I was excited to find something I could use for work, since there was no microwave. It takes like an hour to warm up the food which I was okay to adjust to that, but after the 3rd use, it stopped working…. The plate no longer got hot. Pretty disappointing..

I received the package on time which was great. But then upon looking at the bag it had stains on it. I would have been okay with it but the inside container was all broken and the hot plate looks like it’s been throughly used and dirty.

I’ve purchased my 3rd hot logic! The 1st lasted me a year and was great! My second purchase lasted 6 months and my last purchase lasted one week! I’m going to assume that it’s not made to last being that it 40.00 bucks!

reviewTitle: Don't worth it take too long to heat up my food
reviewDescription: This is not worth buying to heat up my lunch at work have to wait up to 2/hours to heat up my food
I’ve had it about a month and a half and it was great.  Then just stopped working for no reason.  I’d recommend spending the extra money and buy something well built.

reviewTitle: It worked for less than a month
reviewDescription: I’ve had this product before and it lasted me around 3 years which was amazing. So after that first one gave out on me I ordered it again and this second unit only lasted me around 3 weeks. And there’s no way to exchange it.

I've been using a microwave for leftovers for so long that I've forgotten how much it affects the flavors of the food, so the first time using this to warm leftovers was almost like a revelation. Super convenient as well.UPDATE: Although I like the results, the zipper has started catching every single time, now I takes me 4-5 attempts to close it. It's become very annoying. Dropped from 5 stars down to 2 stars since I'm about to throw it in the trash.UPDATE 2: The junk zipper broke after it caught again, rendering this thing useless. It's gone in the trash. Buying a competitor instead to replace it.

The heating unit works great. I sent 2 messages over a 7 day period because the zipper on the case was broken. Apparently they chose to ignore my messages so I returned it and bought one from someone else.  I recommend finding another seller. This one doesn't respond to messages. Great product though.

This bag for starters doesn't accommodate the food container. The bag has a opening in the bag where the plug goes through which allows the heat to escape, so it take way longer to heat up food. Overall disappointing compared to the last bag I owned.😐😑😏😮‍💨. Bag also purchased in February of 2024 and stopped working by May!!!

I'm am so disappointed I ordered this.hotlogic used to have great products.the inside used to be glass now the inside is something you would get from Applebee's from take out didn't get a cord to plug in the wall either.what a piece of junk .seriously

The previous reviews were correct; the zipper was faulty. When I finally got the cover to unzip, the plate inside appeared scratched. I’m not sure if this was used and returned, but I was not interested in keeping this item. It was quickly returned for a refund. The concept of this device is clever, but it certainly lacks in development and execution.

reviewTitle: Product does not meet my needs.
reviewDescription: It doesn’t work as advertised.

reviewTitle: Perfect for those who travel a lot and bring their own food.
reviewDescription: Works as advertised. Great for traveling and reheating prepped meals on the road.
loveit,very useful in my work

I've been using this for 5 years.  I keep it at work and use it for 90% of my lunches.  It's obviously perfect for reheating leftovers or frozen meals.  It can also be used for cooking food from raw.  I've made frozen chicken breast (cut in half), onions, potatoes and broc for one of my fav fresh lunches.  I've put other raw foods... you have to do some trial and error to figure out just how to you need to prepare the raw items so they can fully cook in time (for me it's usually about 4-5 hours between the time I get to work until I have lunch).  Only time I've been disappointed was thicker baby carrots weren't fully cooked.  But if I slice them in half, they were perfect.  I've got one for the office, one mini for home as well as the family size.  I've also purchased them for my kids in college as well as given them as gifts to my employees.  I've yet to have an issue with any of them... and those who have been gifted them have reported the same.  Just don't reheat in styrofoam or plastic bags (at least not w/o a barrier like a paper plate).  If you forget the plate, you'll have a heck of a mess to clean up.
Flight crews swear by it. Sadly, more of our hotel rooms don’t have microwaves. I will never have that concern again. ++it’s lighter than my laptop.

reviewTitle: Works great for this Truck Driver
reviewDescription: I meal prep my meals for work , I put my container in the warmer and about 30-45 minutes my food is hot .

This thing is great. It heats left overs to the perfect temp in about an hour. You will never want to use a microwave again. I Purchased a glass dish for it. It came with a plastic takeout style one. You need this product.
Works well to warm up a meal. Takes a bit longer than I thought but it does the job.
Got this for my daughter who is a flight attendant & is having to make & take meals with her. She was told about the convenience of this from other flight attendants.
My husband works construction sites and loves this

reviewTitle: Culinary Convenience at Your Fingertips: A Review of the HotLogic Mini Portable Oven Food Warmer
reviewDescription: As a busy individual who appreciates the pleasure of enjoying warm and delicious meals on the go, I recently had the privilege of using the HotLogic Mini Portable Oven Food Warmer, and I'm excited to share my thoughts on this incredibly convenient kitchen gadget. With its innovative design and efficient heating capabilities, the HotLogic Mini has redefined the way I approach mealtime, offering a new level of culinary convenience.Effortless Food Warming:The HotLogic Mini Portable Oven is a true game-changer when it comes to warming meals. Its user-friendly design allows you to effortlessly heat up your favorite dishes without the need for a microwave or stovetop. Simply place your meal inside, plug in the Mini, and let it work its magic. Whether you're at the office, on the road, or anywhere in between, the Mini ensures that your food is warmed to perfection.Consistent and Even Heating:One of the standout features of the HotLogic Mini is its ability to provide consistent and even heating. The patented Smart Shelf technology ensures that your meal is heated thoroughly without hot or cold spots. This technology preserves the flavors and textures of your food, so you can enjoy a meal that's just as delightful as when it was freshly prepared.Versatile and Practical:The HotLogic Mini Portable Oven is incredibly versatile, accommodating a variety of food containers and sizes. Whether you're reheating leftovers, bringing frozen meals to the perfect temperature, or simply keeping your food warm until you're ready to eat, the Mini has you covered. Its compact size makes it a practical companion for any situation, from workdays to road trips.Convenience Redefined:The convenience offered by the HotLogic Mini goes beyond its warming capabilities. Its portability and simplicity of use mean you no longer need to rely on communal microwaves or settle for lukewarm meals. The Mini empowers you to enjoy hot, home-cooked food whenever and wherever you desire, adding a touch of comfort and satisfaction to your daily routine.Energy Efficiency:The HotLogic Mini is not only a time-saver but also an energy-efficient option. Its low energy consumption ensures that you can warm your meals without worrying about hefty electricity bills. This feature makes the Mini a sustainable choice for those seeking both convenience and environmental responsibility.Conclusion:The HotLogic Mini Portable Oven Food Warmer is a culinary game-changer that redefines convenience in meal preparation. Its innovative design, consistent heating, and versatility make it an indispensable tool for busy individuals and travelers alike. Say goodbye to cold and uninspiring meals on the go—the HotLogic Mini empowers you to enjoy warm, home-cooked food whenever and wherever you desire. If you're seeking a solution that combines efficiency, taste, and practicality, the HotLogic Mini is a must-have kitchen gadget that elevates your dining experience to new heights.
Only get a couple months of daily use before it quits working

purchased  and delivered may 21,,here it is july 17 and this thing is already FALLING apart at the seams !! it still works i guess but for the price of these things you would figure they would last longer,,on a brighter notethey are awesome when it comes to heating  your lunch at work,,i always kept the bag in my locker and just take the bowl home so its not like it lived a rough life !! i had numerous people ask me about it and directed them to amazonwhich probably 5-7 people ordered them from here ,,ive looked for similar products like this that maybe might be more durable or better quality ,,, no luck,,i guess ill just have to slap some duct tape on it to keep it from ripping anymore,,im sure when other people see my tape they will probably have 2nd thoughts on buying one of these,,I WOULD
It heats up fine but... but!The zipper is HORRIBLE and erases all the positive aspects.Wow this is beyond bad!

This product that the potential to be my life savor. I am a international flight attendant that travels frequently which means I bring my own food to cut cost internationally. When my cousin told me about the oven immediately ordered mine just before Christmas. It cooked fine the first few times, I've been noticing it's taking longer and longer to cook the simple things. I had some rice left over from dinner .  It didn't cook my rice, I put some Asian food in  went to the city and came back the food was barely warm. Tonight I placed pre cooked chicken and rice in there again (the hotel i am in doesn't offer a microwave) for almost two hours. I came back the food was cold on top and sides! The plate gets hot but it's not worth it if it doesn't cook all the way around. It should be noted that I love used both the glass and metal Tupperware.

I bought this product because I’m always on the go in a car. I was really excited to find this product and that I don’t have to waste more money buying lunch everyday. The times that I did used it to warm up my lunch I was very satisfied with the outcome but now it’s broken. Bought it the end of March, now it’s in the mid May, used it less than 10 times and it’s not working anymore. I didn’t mind the amount of time it took to warm up my food as long as it does warm it up by the time I have lunch but this is horrible. It broke too soon for the amount of times I used it. I didn’t even get to use it that much before it broke down. And my return window ended on April 27.
After using it for a while it looses heat

reviewTitle: Stopped working after a few months
reviewDescription: I loved this until it broke. Of course it broke after I can no longer return it. I spend a lot of time in hotels and I depend on this to heat up my food most of the time since some hotels do not have microwaves to use. Takes a long time to warm up your food since it’s just a hot plate but now it seems to have stopped warming up all together. Just waited 2 hours for my food to warm up and the plate is still cold. The outlet works so I know that is not the issues. Not sure if it’s worth buying another one if it’s just going to break after a few months

Cheap junk. The zipper came off track the FIRST time I opened it. Also the FIRST time I opened the lunch box I find that the container is cracked and won’t close properly. Overall just a cheap lunchbox. You’ll probably have to take the heater out and use your own lunchbox.

Hot logic has become cheap. The first picture is what I received in my package today and the second picture is the glass container I received in my first hotlogic i bought a few years ago. Not worth the $40 something dollars.

Title pretty much sums it up, although it did work great for 2 years of almost daily use so I suppose I got my money's worth. I'm considering purchasing another, except this time I might get the 110v plug and get a 110v to 12v converter.
Been using these warmers for years off and on. Got this one in September used it maybe 10 times, the plug got so hot it was melting.
The item came only with a CAR charger for warming! Inwill be at work at my desk. I thought it would be optional for both. I definitely do not warm my food in the car but this was the only option.
Worked great for 6 days. The seventh day my lunch was hotter than normal and the eighth day it quit working. I guess you get what you pay for.
Used it a couple of times and it stopped working
could not use it.  It was my fault that I ordered the wrong one.  I did not check the plug.  I am ordering another one with a household plug.  It is good quality.
This product did work, but not for long. I had it not even a full 3 months before it completely stopped working.

reviewTitle: Not working, not even a month later..
reviewDescription: It was working fine; then suddenly it just stopped.
This product worked great but for only 2 weeks and now it does not work. Needs better build quality.

reviewTitle: I’m highly disappointed! I read all the instructions and did exactly ...
reviewDescription: I’m highly disappointed! I read all the instructions and did exactly what I was supposed to do. I drive all over for work, I have a large territory so I thought this would be perfect. I put my leftovers in when I got in my car and plugged it in like directed. All the sudden about 15-20 mins later I start getting a horrible headache! All I smell is this toxic smell and I didn’t even realize it was from the hot logic! I immediately unplugged it. I AM PREGNANT and I had to roll my windows down in extremely cold weather so I could drive because the smell was so horrific. I tried calling customer service several times and they have ONE person who is does their customer service &  her name is ANN and she WILL NOT PICK UP I had no time to eat, wasted food and was starving.  I want a full refund and I will never purchase anything from them again. Worst experience ever!

reviewTitle: I guess I got a lemon...
reviewDescription: I'm not an angry Amazon reviewer.  I won't buy without reviews, so I try to give honest and fair reviews.  I was so excited about this purchase because my guy delivers packages for a living.  He is always eating at fast food spending too much money, making unhealthy choices, etc.  I read the reviews and got this for his birthday.  He and I were so excited.  It's maiden voyage was sad...especially since this was a gift.  He finally took it to work with some awesome spaghetti and meatball leftovers, and 1) it didn't heat, and 2) the zipper broke on the first try.  It was very cheaply made.  Even the painting was coming off the stretched piece of broken metal.  Just poor, poor quality.  Again, I might have gotten a lemon, but a lemon, I definitely did.
Takes a long time to warm up food so you have to plan ahead of time so you can warm up food before you get hungry. Works well on road trips or if you work in the middle of nowhere like myself

I bought this to take to work with me. I warm up frozen meals and leftovers on it all the time. As long as you remember to put your food in a couple of hours before lunch it works fantastic. And food tastes so much better than using the microwave.
The lunch box is small, lightweight, and heats well. It does take some time to heat up so be patient. Also, the zipper seems flimsy so be care with the hardware. I like it though.

I love everything about this case.  I have saved so much on lunch not going to the cafeteria daily.  The food is perfectly heated through by lunch time and I don't have to waste time retrieving food from a restaurant or the cafeteria giving me more me time on my lunch break.  Only thing I wish is that it had an on/off swath so I didn't have to unplug it  everyday since all my outlets are under my desk.

reviewTitle: It does what it's stated to do, literally.
reviewDescription: Pros: Now got it and used it only once but it heated refrigerated soup to an edible temperature in around 1.20 hours. The heat proof appeared durable and definitely easy to clean.It's neat and looks well anywhere it's placed.Cons: The zipper keeps snagging the bag material at a corner and it could have been a bit taller to accommodate a larger container.

reviewTitle: This is my first review!!! Perfect for work for people who don't want to microwave!
reviewDescription: I'm very food conscious, and am against using a microwave. I cook my meals at home, and was getting up extra early every morning to heat up my lunch and put it in a thermos. I don't like using the thermos because it invariably touches the plastic inside the cap, and hot, I fear it leaches plastic particles into my food. I was looking for a solution that I could use at work to heat up my food more easily without all the planning and thermos issues. This product is a dream come true!! I used it today for the first time, and in 15 minutes the chili I made at home and was at refrigerator temperature was piping HOT!!! It is somewhat of a glorified hot plate, but I love the fact that the food isn't in plain sight while heating at my desk. I couldn't be happier. I wouldn't use this for carrying a ton of heavy things though. To me that's fine, as I try to reduce bulk when commuting.

Got to love hot lunch on the job site! I use it for everything! Regular lunch meals to muffins and cookies! One disappointment the paint flaked off of the heater surface. Other than that everything it great and you can wipe the inside easily. Zipper is light weight so not sure about longevity on that. Get the Pyrex from Walmart or online to for a perfect fit with no plastic on there!

reviewTitle: Good for construction brothers and sisters
reviewDescription: Heats food slowly on jobs with 120v

I've been using this lunchbox for 8 months and it's been great. Unfortunately it stopped working yesterday; the light comes on but it doesn't heat up. Was a lifesaver while it lasted so i'll still give it 4 stars

So far so good ….. easy to use !!! I was skeptical about this but it’s working as described. I plug in an hour before lunch ….. this was so I remembered. When I came back to it …. It was nicely heated and the plastic container was not melted .

I’m a local truck driver and I use this daily to heat up my lunch. It’s never let me down and you can’t beat the price. It takes about 45-60 minutes to get something scorching hot but it’s worth it to me!

I rarely write reviews but I love this so much. I actually just bought a second one so I can have one at work and one at home. It heats food dishes so nicely, especially things like pasta and soup. It's much better than having it in the microwave and being unevenly cooked. Also, I'm very busy at work so it's nice to be able to just have it sitting there warm when I have time to eat it and not worry about it burning.
My lunch was hot enough to eat. money well spent.

reviewTitle: I look forward to lunch at work now!
reviewDescription: I’m a convert! I got this for a work field trip with my high school students where we stayed in a hotel. I don’t like paying to eat out all the time in the city, so I tried this out. It was great for oatmeal in the morning and heating up leftovers from when we did eat out. But then I brought it back to my office and use it several times a week. I love that I can pull leftovers out of the freezer and pop them in in the morning and they are warm and evenly heated at lunch and I don’t have to wait in the microwave line to end up with food with hot spots and frozen spots. On pizza fundraiser day I put my sad little slices of gluten-free pizza that have been out of the oven for 45 minutes straight onto the hot plate for 15-20 minutes until they are crispy just getting melty and appetizing again. No time for packing a lunch? I have shelf-stable Indian packets in my desk and just throw an unopened one in for an hour or two. I keep a canister of food-safe wipes at my desk to clean after I put anything directly on the plate. So easy and delicious, I actually look forward to my work lunches!
I bought this for work because I don't have a way to heat my lunch and I am totally impressed with it! Love it!
I bought this to heat my lunch up in the car.  Works great.  After 30-45 minutes the food is the perfect temp to eat.  Very happy with the product.

reviewTitle: 5+ years of daily use and still going strong.
reviewDescription: This is the best purchase I have ever made, hands down. I take pre-made food I made at home and freeze it. After 3-4 hours it's HOT! I absolutely love my hot logic!!

I gifted the Mini Lunch Box Food Heater to my husband, who works as a truck driver. He was impressed with how quickly it heats up food and maintains its temperature. It's been a great product for him, providing convenience and efficiency during his long shifts on the road. Overall, it's an excellent product that meets his needs perfectly.
I have been using this for over a year without any issues as traveling field service technician this keeps my luch warm.
It is so handy. I use it all the time to heat my lunch, or to take food to eat on a road trip.

reviewTitle: Does the job but the heat gives off a scent..
reviewDescription: Great for traveling but I do think the container makes the food have a “container smell”? My food tastes like it’s been in a box and I don’t like that. Maybe I will try using a glass container instead of plastic. But it does keep my food warm. I would suggest buying this but try to use a glass container.

Warmer worked well for 5 months then stopped working.  I bought this for my husband who is a truck driver so he is on the road all day.  He liked being able to warm up his lunch as he drove.  Unfortunately it gave out after 5 months.

This little gadget was great for my Husband in Law Enforcement  who spends long hours in a car until it broke today. Only lasted less then a year. Tried it on 3 vehicles to make sure, and it’s confirmed that it is completely dead. Unfortunately it was very short lived.

I used this product to heat up my food at work. Due to COVID we weren’t allowed to used microwave. This little oven has been great to heat up my food. I plug it in 30 mins before I am going to eat and it works wonders.
Bought in February 2021. Today it stated melting while in use and now I am unable to use it at work. Absolutely loved this until today. Great for the ambulance when it worked.
